revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Works Of the Most Reverend Dr. John Tillotson, Lord Archbishop of Canterbury. In Twelve Volumes. Containing, Two Hundred and Fifrty Four Sermons and Discourses..."
revision.text: Possibly: The Works Of the Most Reverend Dr. John Tillotson, Lord Archbishop of Canterbury. In Twelve Volumes. Containing, Two Hundred and Fifrty Four Sermons and Discourses on Several Occasions: Together with the Rule of Faith; Prayers Composed by him for his own Use; A Discourse to his Servants before the Sacrament; And a Form of Prayer, Composed by him, for the Use of King William. 12v. (London : Printed for J. and R. Tonson and S. Draper... M DCC XLVIII. [1748]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2414104~S1
